title: Documents) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 300 of 2013) is amended by the insertion
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Central Bank Act 1942 (Service
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Central Bank Act 1942 (Service 

of Notices and Other Documents) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 15 July 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited central bank act 1942 (service notice documents) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 15 july 2025

title: Documents) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 300 of 2013) is amended by the insertion
heading: 2. Regulation 3 of the Central Bank Act 1942 (Service of Notices and Other
text_raw:
2. Regulation 3 of the Central Bank Act 1942 (Service of Notices and Other 
Documents) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 300 of 2013) is amended by the insertion 
of the following paragraph after paragraph (da): 

“(db) Part 2 of the Finance (Provision of Access to Cash Infrastructure) 

Act 2025 (No. 4 of 2025);”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 July, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 11th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [302] 3
